content:
Sure, here's an example Facebook post that starts with a fun fact:

Fun fact: Did you know that women make up over half of all solo travelers? This Women's Month, we celebrate all the adventurous women out there who are unafraid to explore the world on their own terms. Whether you're traveling with your furry best friend or venturing out on your own, PetFriendly has your back with thousands of pet-friendly stays on Maui and beyond. So why wait? Start planning your next adventure today and discover all the amazing places that await you! 🌺🐾✈️ #WomensMonth #TravelMore #PetFriendly
